website_summaries.verdict: The sofa of choice if you want to make a bold statement of color in any room. Purple fabric stands out from other typical U-shaped sectionals.
pros: Profile of the sectional is narrow, making it easier to fit in tighter spaces
cons: Sofa requires a neutral color palette in the room to fit in

customer_reviews.title: Big comfy couch
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch so much. It fits our room perfectly and I’m happy every time I look as it. To give a fair review, I will give pros and cons. PROS: Beautiful Large Comfortable Not that difficult to assemble. You can separate the pieces CONS Cushions have a tendency to slide Collects lint easily Back is a bit low if you’re tall Chaises kind of short
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Within 60 days the leg started to break apart. I contacted the seller and they said they couldn’t help with a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: COMFY COZY...Perfect for Lounging!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...2 extra large chaise so 2 people can relax and lounge!!! The sofa and love seat we had was real leather and great, but whoever got the loveseat while watching TV could not lay down and be comfortable. We moved those to another room and now, 2 people can be comfortable while watching TV. I would have given this 5 stars, except the bottom fabric is very cheap material, and the back and bottom cushions don’t have velcro and keep sliding forward. Other that that, I am in love with this sofa!!! It’s so comfortable, I’ve fallen asleep on it many times! For the price, what a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Sasashay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to put together comes with tools as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy easy to put together comes with tools as well very large I love it Oh it comes in three huge boxes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Gorgeous large size two chaise couch I mixed red gray and black velvet pillows on this Fabulous !!
customer_reviews.author: SUNSHINE

customer_reviews.title: Great couch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We were scared at first. Not knowing the demnsions (12'×4.5') and if the color was going to be ok or how comfortable it was going to be. It was a gamble and we struck the JACKPOT. Its so comfortable.. the bottom cushions are firm.. but not uncomfortably firm. The back cushions are soft but have support. I am laying down on the couch as i write this. Am I happy? Yes.. I am! Update +9 months: Back cushions need added memory foam to retain shape. Still love the couch. 4 stars Update update: +16 months: Finally bought the memory foam. Still love the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, not sustainable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this couch as it looked perfect with my living room set up, but that’s about it. Very uncomfortable, cushions slide everywhere. I wish I would have paid better attention to the reviews! It is built very poorly and the legs began breaking within the first 3 months that I purchased. After contacting the sellers- they told me there was nothing they could do, so I had to makeshift replacement legs, since they are not sold anywhere else. Overall, cheap couch and not very durable. It’s more for looks than anything.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Should not be allowed to sell
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is bad. It is shipped in 3 boxes and needs to be assembled, which is really easy. The problem is that it is built with very thin plywood and some parts aren’t even nailed, but glued together. I had left chase back support cracked the same day, and midsection back support cracked the next day. It might have been more sturdier if it were standing against the wall, but my configuration is freestanding. Very disappointed and returning it back. Save your box!
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and looks like the pic. The black is nice and velvety [if that's even a word] :) and it's nice and large..covers a nice amount of space in your living room. It feels durable when sitting on it. It's not Plushy soft but feels strong when you sit on it... but it's not uncomfortable, you just don't SINK into it, it holds you up. So, it seems like it will last a long time. You just feel like you have to be super careful as if anything spills or drops on it you'll have some real cleaning to do.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Purchase Velcro for the bottom cushions.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is good. How ever when you sit on the cushions it slides forward and has you sit awkward. So I purchased double side Velcro from amazon for $12 and it fixed the issue. It came on time and not damaged. I was able to put it together myself. The back support is a little low for comfort. But I believe the build is strong I’m a bigger guy and I don’t feel like it’s going to break. It held together very solid with several of my in laws and kids horsing around in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Just right for me
customer_reviews.text: You can tell it's not high end, but it's worth the price. I intend to add some memory foam to the back cushions, and an anti slip pad for the seat cushions, the covers have a zipper. This sofa met all my needs dimensionally and capacity wise, I found the perfect rug, and overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sofa for less than a year. It looks awful now. The back cushions are worn out and sad. And the seat cushions don’t stay in place for one thing and are SUPER hard and uncomfortable. I would’ve sent it back if it hadn’t taken me half the day to assemble. Waste of $700.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely unhappy with this product. We assembled it fine. One day of light use and the back ( I'm going to call it headboard for ease of description) was wobbly. We flip over the couch to find the problem. Where the headboard screws into the bottom they just stapled. No wood glue. So you have a headboard attached to a beam. This beam is just stapled to the support beam of the couch. We now have a broken couch, with litteraly only 24 hours of use that we spent over $700 on. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Ellenberg

customer_reviews.title: 7 kids & 2 of these couches
customer_reviews.text: We have 7 children and bought 2 of these couches. They work great for us! Plenty of room for everyone to sit! It would be nice if the back was higher and it hurts like crazy if your feet run into the metal legs, but those are the only complaints. The cushions are comfortable and stay in place. The velvet material is soft, easy to wipe clean, and doesnt show spills (we got the black and the blue). I read the reviews prior to purchasing, but decided these were too good of a deal to pass up- and I dont regret it at all!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kapalka

customer_reviews.title: Ups and downs (update)
customer_reviews.text: So theres alot of good things about this couch. Its big. Its very Blue lol. Its soft to the touch. But the assembly process is very bad. No piece is labled. ie "A" "B" "C" ect. It came with off set holes on the legs. Holes that you screw the actual screw into are not drilled good therefore you have to really tork the shhh out of the allen wrench. Some of my legs only have 1 screw holding it up because the offset holes. It sucks. A few months later Regret ordering before trying it out.. its super uncomfortable. Im already looking for a new couch with more comfort. The end cushions are way to short.
customer_reviews.author: Nexus

customer_reviews.title: Small, comfortable sectional. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this sofa, and purchased at a great price. It fits perfectly into our space and provides ample seating. Because our space is small we wanted a sectional with a chaise but couldn't fit a standard size, but this smaller chaise is great for our space. The kids love it and have taken over! We had some trouble fitting one chaise back on because screw holes were not aligned. After having it a few months the back of the loveseat wants to loosen up, we are currently looking for a solution to fix it more permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Mom

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to get a new couch. Especially a cheap one because I have 3 kids and they get food and stains everywhere. Well this came in yesterday, I got it set up this afternoon in about 20 minutes. Within 10 minutes of it being set up, my daughter walked to go lay on the couch, she hit her foot on the metal leg and now we have to go to the emergency room for stitches. Get what you pay for I guess.. $2000 for an ER visit plus $800 for a budget couch, or invest in something that will last you longer and not cut your child on cheaply made parts
customer_reviews.author: Bud Verissimo

customer_reviews.title: 100% on Rotton Tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this purchase! It arrived exactly on time, which was only a 4 day wait! Delivered to my door! (I live in an apartment so this was great) and really easy to assemble! The double chase is really great! The non-chase seats are a bit shallow but still functional. I wouldn’t call the material velvet, but still soft and comfy! It is firm, so if you’re looking for something to sink into, this isn’t for you. I have not had problems with the cushions sliding. And the back cushions veloco to the back of the couch. Also Doggo approved!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Gilsdorf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and modern couch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and modern couch. I really like them and the look of them but I give it 4 stars because its too stiff... The fabric is soft and the back cushions are soft but the seat part of the couch is firmer than I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: ariel rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good sofa. Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sofa. We have a family of 6 and sit comfortably together on it. The only complaint is that the back is very low. I just use a pillow for extra back support, so it’s really not a big issue. It’s a nice couch and I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jdahl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: After waiting over a month for the sofa to show up I received only 2/3 of the couch. Not sure what to do since it states it’s been delivered. The parts I do have seem nice but it defeats the purpose of buying a whole sofa and only getting part of it. Waited way too long and now it’s not all here.
customer_reviews.author: Ross f

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fragile, honest review don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed, this couch was only used for one day for thanksgiving (basement couch) and after 1 week of having it that back support cracked and gave out. Feeling through the fabric there is no support and the base cracked off. It was truly embarrassing when I had to ask my guest to not sit on a “new couch”. Awaiting to hear back from the company, absolutely disappointed and would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Deserto

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but maybe some buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.text: We like the color and the fabric. We don't like the size. The back is short and the middle seat is a bit too short. I like that you can separate the pieces and place them in different positions. Color is perfect. Not too comfy but it is nice. Wish I would have bought a 3 piece recliner set instead but I am not too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Lily

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to put together. The cushions are hard but I’m hoping they loosen up a little. Like others have said, the cushions slip but other than that. It’s a pretty nice couch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are shoving this against the wall DO NOT BUY! You cannot put any pressure on the back. Ours has broken within a month. The fabric, cushions, and size are great, the back support is flimsy and made out of soft wood.
customer_reviews.author: LadyGhoster

customer_reviews.title: Comfortablity- very hard - not well made at all
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable at all cushions are hard and very uncomfortable when sitting on!!! Not worth the money paid . One of the armrest the bottom was crushed we were able to make it work with a piece of plywood however the company is not willing to work with us on any kind of adjustment . Took over three hours to put together it’s more of the type of furniture for a doctors office not comfortable at all ! The solution was to return the whole thing but there’s no way in hell we’re taking it apart after it took us three hours to put together .
customer_reviews.author: GWINE

customer_reviews.title: Good for value and short people!
customer_reviews.text: Buying a sectional online made me nervous, but I'm not completely disappointed with the result. My only real complaint is that the pads separate easily (bc it's assembled piece by piece) especially the back rest ones. And the back rest height is SUPER SHORT. Like a 70s sort of look (which isn't a bad thing), but if you're 5'8" or taller, I would suggest something with more shoulder/neck support
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan Adderley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, cheap, and shortest sofa I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of furniture possible - it’s so short that my 13 month old is as tall as this tiny sofa. Overpriced for sure and just a total waste of $700 including tax. The fabric smells horrible and the quality is not of any standard I would feel safe to sit on
customer_reviews.author: LaLA

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Took forever to put together, finally got it done, me and my gf sat down for the first time and the back of the center piece snapped off. We are not obese and simply sat down and this happened. I could tell when I was putting it together that it was very cheaply made. Might be worth $200 at the most and even then would be more suited for children than adults.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lamson

customer_reviews.title: No customer service for replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Defective part. The zipper that is supposed to hold the arm cushion on has the same zipper on both pieces. I’ve called the phone number listed and there is no answer. No customer service email is listed for resolving issues.
customer_reviews.author: Teri from USA

customer_reviews.title: Great if you get all packages.
customer_reviews.text: The couch is amazing, well the pieces of it we got. We got both chases and it’s great as a love seat put together but we did pay for both. We know it’s not the sellers fault, they’ve been very helpful and doing all they can. It’s UPS. For some reason it’s black covering the address so they haven’t been able to get it to us still but it says all delivered and it’s not. It’s still a great product even without all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Shalyssa Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 months of use and took months to return. Seemed like a great deal, but I'll spend $700 on something now sturdy
customer_reviews.author: L&N Smith

customer_reviews.title: Chic Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7 and the sectional is a little short in length as far as extending the legs are concerned. Nothing that an ottoman won’t fix. It’s also close to the ground. But I absolutely love it, what a steal. Invest in some couch protectors, hair sticks and obviously shows because it’s black.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Dismuke

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write reviews, but I have to try and save someone from buying this couch. It is truly the most uncomfortable, awkwardly-shaped, and ugly couch I’ve ever sat on. Also, we ordered it in grey and it came blue. Yikers! Biggest waste of money since the last stimulus check!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning the couch because it was comically short and small. It looks as if it’s made for children not adults. I’m addition to the small size it also looks and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice sofa but maybe different color
customer_reviews.text: The product arrive late than expected. The package is very big. So make sure you measure your door and your space correctly. I just din’t like the color, look a little bit old. However,the quality is very good and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: angie123

customer_reviews.title: Great couch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was pretty straight forward. The middle cushions are a little on the stiffer side, but they'll wear in just fine. I highly recommend scotch guarding the fabric as you're installing it to protect from stains and spills. The cushions do slide around a little on the chaise sections, but nothing some velcro can't fix. It's a great buy for the money and it fit our odd sized living room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Furtado

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sectional. Overall the product is absolutely worth it. Very large, elegant and comfy. It did come with one stripped bolt but luckily I had extra.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Won’t recommend.  Cheap piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap looking furniture. Within 4-5 uses the cushions sagged making it very uncomfortable to sit on. For the side chaise, the back became much lower than the front. Exteremly uncomfortable. The back is short as well so you shoulders have nov back support.
customer_reviews.author: mks

customer_reviews.title: SMALL SECTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: This sofa says extra large, IT IS NOT. I’m 5’5 and the chaises are short for me. In a decent sized living room it looks like toy furniture. It’s modern and the velvet is beautiful but it’s soooooo small. Not really for a family space, maybe an apartment. It’s not heavy either, not very sturdy, but you get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as deep as I expected. Very comfy, other reviews mentioned not liking that the back of the couch is low, but the high back coushons help with that. Nice to sit on, 4 people could comfortable sit on it. It’s very long, the blue color is great! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I thought so that is good. It did take me awhile to put together. At first the instructions look overwhelming but then it gets easier to follow. Also the cushions at first were stiff but after I've sat on them for a couple of weeks it is now comfortable. So not a bad couch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: brooke bussie

customer_reviews.title: Dazed & Confused
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to give this 5 stars. Love the color, love the size. What I don't love is that the entire right chaise isn't Able to connect to the center portion so it goes flying anytime I knock into it. And there's no Velcro for some of the cushions. I also got an extra armrest cushion. Don't know what that's about.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Daggs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: At first i was a little scared do to the reviews i read but still took the risk and bought it, I don’t regret it, It fits our room perfectly, its easy to assemble and looks gorgeous, i just would buy some cushions to make it look prettier
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: For short people
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but back support and leg rest are short. My legs hang off and I’m 5’10
customer_reviews.author: David Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love this couch
customer_reviews.text: it's very firm and lower to the ground. If you don't want those, then you might not enjoy it. I love the color and style. I also think the firmness is comfortable IMO. I just tossed on a few extra throw pillows and now it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: nicole hanel

customer_reviews.title: Purple is the bomb!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the purple color. It is a firm couch not for too much deep couch sitting but I have small ones to chase. Very stylish and I have gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: kerri

customer_reviews.title: Awsome for big families
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Its soft firm and huge its perfect for my house hold of 8. If you have little kids and are not looking for your forever couch this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Missing chaise
customer_reviews.text: Hi, so far only two pieces have arrived. I see on my account it was delivered but I’m missing one whole side. I hope someone will contact me tomorrow during business hours to resolve this or track my missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sean maag

customer_reviews.title: Detective, Hard and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Hard cushions are definitely not memory foam. They feel more like large packing peanuts. The screw base also came out during assembly. I cannot reccomend anyone buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. P.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had for 3 months now and it’s wxcellent i sleep on it about 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Oneway18

customer_reviews.title: It’s ehh okay you pay for what you get !
customer_reviews.text: The couch was so hard to assemble.. and the delivery was so unorganized I received everything on different days at odd times with no accurate tracking . Quality is okay you pay for what you get keep that in mind :) it’s an okay couch I give it 3 stars pieces are janky .
customer_reviews.author: Tamani E.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this sectional and even more the price. Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but a little stiff.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad couch overall, but it's not that comfortable. It's comfortable enough for a couch you might find in an office, but not the kind of comfort you expect to have in someone's home. If you replace the cushions it would be 5 hands down. Wouldn't recommend for people who weigh over 200lbs, lest you run the risk of the cheap cushions losing shape.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great couch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful couch. Not super study. We added reinforcements in the back. We do not regret the purchase. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful and firm ♡ great for the price! The back cushions might need refilling in the future. I assembled it by myself so its user friendly! And comes with needed parts and not super heavy one person can do it but it takes time
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Soft
customer_reviews.text: The color and feel are very nice. The only drawback is that the back is a little low. We use it for our lounging, tv-watching couch, so it works well.
customer_reviews.author: MrandMrsT

customer_reviews.title: 2/3rds a sofa review.
customer_reviews.text: Received only 2/3 of the couch. Missing the entire center portion. Not sure what to do since it states it’s been delivered. The parts I do have seem nice but it defeats the purpose of buying a whole sofa and only getting part of it. The cushions are a little firm and soft. Not a fan of the legs, but there is room to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wartzok

customer_reviews.title: The piece you need of you have a big family!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it literally came in two days! Secondly, it was a piece of cake to set up! Screw on the feet and slide in the pieces... done! Came in 3 HUGE boxes. (youll need some muscle for that part) but OMG it is the sectional of our dreams! Super comfy and just gorgeous! We LOVE it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: I Dolled it!

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this sofa. It’s big however the quality is not worth the money. It was a complete waste
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.text: when sitting the stew takes off forwards. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Coutinho

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful product! I have had this item less than a year and to say I’m extremely disappointed is an understatement. First it came with a defect in the fabric, quite noticeable. Now, after hand washing 3 times, two cushion covers rip at the seams. Conincidence? Or cheap? I spent over $900 on this and it is crap!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Although the couch looks nice the proportions are weird. It’s also way too firm and uncomfortable. Would definitely not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sofa
customer_reviews.text: OMG love this couch it fit perfect in my space and its super comfortable easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Eye PLeaser!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wife/ Mama Reporting - I bought the navy blue color - its much brighter - more like colbalt - which I LOVE . Very large - has 2 chaise's - family of 3 - we can all fit. Its firm, but very comfortable. HUsband fell asleep on it right away - LOOL. Assembly moderately difficult, but doable with my 8 yr old. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rob burlingame

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay I guess
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a few holes for the legs so I had to drill my own. The color is nice but the cushions kinda suck if you sit in the for more than like an hour they get flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this couch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this couch!!! It is so comfortable, very large (12ft long) and arrangeable which was definitely a plus for me!! Turns out the couch was too long for my apartment, so I had to rearrange the way I set it up, which still turned out AMAZING! Only giving this a 4 Star because the back of the cushions don’t have Velcro or anything to hold it to the back, so they sorta slide off which is a downside of it all. Otherwise this couch is SUPER nice and I do not regret buying it, especially for that price! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Great price. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Love it. Love it. Nice and roomy. No shipping damage. Everything was included no pieces missing. Soft back cushions. Firm seating.
customer_reviews.author: Toney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this couch and bought it before reading the reviews. Almost cancelled my order because it seemed like all the reviews were negative but I’m glad that I didn’t. I love this sectional. It’s exactly what I was wanting and I did not have to spend thousands on it.
customer_reviews.author: William Mathew Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Great couch n price
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s big n comfy. Cushions are firm but comfy. Plenty of room. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Camp

customer_reviews.title: Small and sits very low, perfect for kids playroom.
customer_reviews.text: The set is smaller than I anticipated even after looking at the reviews. The back is not high so it's definitely not for leaning back and relaxing. It is however, perfect for a kids play area which is what I ended up using it for. I will go local and by a different set more suitable for a den.
customer_reviews.author: STARR ANDREWS-SNELL

customer_reviews.title: Couch is about 20 inches shorter than listed.
customer_reviews.text: This couch is listed as being 143 inches wide. I bought it because that would have fit my living room perfect. It’s way smaller. Only 120 inches according to our measurements. I’m a little disappointed. Also the fabric is more of a microfiber than velvet. This couch is pretty, but not super comfy for my main couch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not a big comfy couch 🥴
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooo cute for so my space! I absolutely love this couch... the seats are not as wide as I’d like them to be for lounging and the seat cushions are a little firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Toccara Gould

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Came in so many pieces I never had to put a couch together but once I did it does look nice but it’s cheaply made some of the screws did not fit took forever to put together I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Marquita Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love the couch
customer_reviews.text: I entertain a lot at home and this couch serves the perfect purpose. There's lots of room for everyone and it's wide and comfy! Totally love it!
customer_reviews.author: LYNETTE M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the parts being delivered on diffrent days. But the company was on top of it offered me a full refund if it didnt all show up. It did and im vary happy it did great comfortable couch!
customer_reviews.author: P.pep85

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Super uncomfortable and not safe. The legs of the couch are sharp! We have actually cut our toes and feet pretty bad when we accidentally hit one the legs. The couch has pretty color to us but it is not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: ☹️
customer_reviews.text: You get what you see in the picture, is a good price but the couch is not that comfortable. It doesn't have proper back support. Hard to be watching a movie without getting back pain
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how adorable this sofa was. It’s super comfy and aesthetically pleasing. I get compliments all the time. It was easy to put together and I couldn’t be anymore happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: charity

customer_reviews.title: READ:
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Save your money! It’s way too stiff & there’s no support for your back.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob swales

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and comfortable. Has a modern look and looks great with color pillows, vintage accents and even farmhouse style decor.
customer_reviews.author: Camyra Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I wish it wasn’t so low
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Color (navy) is beautiful. Material is beautiful and soft. However it’s lower than I expected, as in low to the ground not suitable for anyone with back/knee problems .
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few months and holding strong. Very comfy and sturdy have had visitors over and loved it. Large enough to fit my family of 5. Can’t beat the price much more affordable than other online furniture retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: It was a nice couch...maybe treat with more while handling and shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the look and comfort and how soft it is. But it came with damage and after assembly the middle section became loose. See the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My weenie approves!
customer_reviews.text: Love the couch color! It’s very bright! I had some issues putting it together and one of the screws didn’t line up properly so I just didn’t use it. It’s pretty stiff, but I’m hoping it with soften up. I live on the third for and the boxes were pretty easy to move up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Weak back
customer_reviews.text: Unless you plan on reinforcing the back portion (non-chaise portion), be sure to put it on a wall. Very weak backing.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and the price was right.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sofa. A bit slippery and the padding is hard but it looks nice. It is starting to get there. I am not unhappy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Furniture fail
customer_reviews.text: This is not a living room couch, more for a game room. Very uncomfortable and poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Simard

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but attracts lint heavily.
customer_reviews.text: Middle is not deep and it does attract lint heavily. I tried static gaurd but it didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Really love this!
customer_reviews.text: Really great sofa, especially for the price. We bought it in navy and the color is beautiful and vibrant. Firm, but not uncomfortable. Arrived and went together with no problems. Couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: It’s great but
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the color is not gray it’s more light green to me. Also if I could change something it would be for the back cushions to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: deliah

customer_reviews.title: A good calue
customer_reviews.text: Assembly sucks a lot. In all of the ways written. Not too comfy. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mikermo

customer_reviews.title: Already have my favorite stop.
customer_reviews.text: The sectional is beautiful. I've received several complements. But, I do wish there was a brush to clean it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Saadia

customer_reviews.title: the back pillows are lumpy
customer_reviews.text: I like the color great for the price, I wish the back pillows were better made
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa real nice comfy and sturdy !!
customer_reviews.author: Theofficialsammy__

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sofa but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: comfortable sofa although I don’t like the zippered armrests and assembly was very hard!
customer_reviews.author: mor

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a big/comfy couch
customer_reviews.text: Great couch for a good price. I hope they restock, may have to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Collin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and modern only downfall is it took a month to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider
customer_reviews.text: So I bought in navy blue, unfortunately, the couch us 2 different shades. The centerpiece is discolored
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving this couch 5 stars because it's a great sectional for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this couch 5 stars because it's a great sectional for the price. Do know it is very long (a little over 11 feet long). Quality to be expected, only complaint is the cushions need Velcro. They slide out when you sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sofamania Modern Sectional, Large, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackSofamania - Family room / living room sectional sofa with an extra wide double chaise lounge for maximum comfort and space. Ultra soft and durable velvet fabric upholstery, loose back pillows for a plush look and comfort. Sits up to 6 people comfortably. Available in various fun and vibrant colors to best fit your home decor. Plush and durable seat cushions with modern chrome finish legs. Some assembly is required - Assembly instructions and hardware included. Dimensions: 29"H x 130. 5"W x 52. 2"D inches
feature_bullets: Family room / living room sectional sofa with an extra wide double chaise lounge for maximum comfort and space.
Ultra soft and durable velvet fabric upholstery, loose back pillows for a plush look and comfort.
Sits up to 6 people comfortably. Available in various fun and vibrant colors to best fit your home decor.
Plush and durable seat cushions with modern chrome finish legs.
Some assembly is required - Assembly instructions and hardware included.
